Module QemuJuicy
Package qemujuicy.vm

Class VMManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • qemujuicy.vm.VMManager
  • public class VMManager
extends Object
    A virtual machine manager, containing all known VMs. It runs all the actions for a VM, creates, deletes, starts and more.

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      • reorgAndStoreVmListToConfigFile

        private void reorgAndStoreVmListToConfigFile()
